eu.amidst.core.datastream

Class BatchesSpliterator<T extends DataInstance>

  • java.lang.Object
    • eu.amidst.core.datastream.BatchesSpliterator<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - A generic Type that extends the interface DataInstance.
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    Spliterator<DataOnMemory<T>>

    public class BatchesSpliterator<T extends DataInstance>
extends Object
implements Spliterator<DataOnMemory<T>>
    The BatchesSpliterator class implements a Spliterator for iterating over data batches of a DataStream. The data batches are explicitly stored in DataOnMemory objects. This class is used by the class DataStream.

    For further details about the implementation of this class using Java 8 functional-style programming look at the following paper:

    Masegosa et al. Probabilistic Graphical Models on Multi-Core CPUs using Java 8. IEEE-CIM (2015).
